rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Courtyard Adjacent Space
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that flows into a central courtyard, designed with robust Brutalist concrete elements and minimalistic detailing. The space is arranged to comply with Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: A dual-purpose space with open-plan living and dining area that overlooks the central courtyard. The design includes recessed seating nooks and high ceilings to enhance spatial perception.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom. The room is oriented to receive natural sunlight and adheres to Vastu guidelines for optimum comfort.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed guest bedroom designed with a private study space. The room maintains a strong Brutalist aesthetic while ensuring comfort.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office integrated within the villa, designed with functionality in mind. The layout respects Vastu principles for work and productivity.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area adjacent to the central courtyard, designed as a luxury feature with reinforced concrete and subtle lighting.
